affiliation_name: My Holiday Home in Lucca Rental agency
overview:
Owner of My Holiday Home in Lucca Rental agency:

www.myholidayhome.it

ITALIAN RENTAL AGENCY’S PROFILE:

The Italian on-line accommodation agency is located in the Lucca area in Tuscany, in central Italy. We rent out cosy cottages, typical Tuscan farmhouses, standalone houses with private pool, villas in the hills surrounding the city, apartments in the historical centre of Lucca or very close to it. Lucca is a charming historical city in the north of Tuscany: a wonderful setting for anyone who wants to get in touch with the real Tuscan way of life. Lucca is 25km from Pisa.

Join me on FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/PaolaCorsifromLucca

and on TWITTER: http://twitter.com/Paolacorsi
